XH Series Compatibility

JST XH Series Wire Harness

JST XH-compatible wire harnesses with 2.5mm pitch and positive locking mechanism. Widely used in industrial control, LED lighting, and power supply applications. Custom manufacturing from our ISO 9001 certified facility.

JST XH Series Specifications

Pitch
2.5mm
Positions
2-15
Voltage Rating
250V
Current Rating
3A

Why Choose JST XH Series?

Positive Lock Mechanism

Secure locking prevents accidental disconnection in vibration-prone industrial environments.

Higher Power Capacity

3A current rating suitable for power delivery and LED driver applications.

Industrial Reliability

Proven performance in industrial automation and control applications worldwide.

Cost-Effective

Factory-direct pricing offers 30-50% savings compared to branded alternatives.

XH Series Product Range

XH Receptacle Housings

Wire-side housings with positive lock mechanism.

  • • 2-15 positions available
  • • Natural housing color
  • • PA66 material
  • • UL94V-0 flame rating

XH PCB Headers

Through-hole and surface mount mounting options.

  • • THT and SMT available
  • • Vertical and right-angle
  • • Breakaway styles
  • • Tin plating standard

XH Crimp Terminals

Crimp terminals for wire termination.

  • • 26-22 AWG standard
  • • Tin-plated copper
  • • Bulk packaging
  • • Reel packaging available

Primary XH Series Applications

01 Industrial Control Systems

PLC I/O connections, sensor wiring, actuator cables, and control panel interconnects. The positive lock ensures reliable connections in vibration environments.

Vibration Resistant Secure Lock

02 LED Lighting & Power Supplies

LED driver connections, power supply interfaces, and LED module wiring. 3A current capacity handles LED strip and module power requirements.

3A Rating 250V

03 Battery Management Systems

Battery pack connections, BMS wiring, and power distribution in portable equipment and energy storage systems.

Battery Rated Secure Connection

04 General Electronics

Power supply connections, control boards, and general wire-to-board interconnects requiring reliable locking and moderate current capacity.

Versatile Widely Used

Custom XH Wire Harness Configurations

Single-Ended Harnesses

XH connector on one end, open wires or other connector on the opposite end.

  • • Custom wire lengths
  • • Various gauges
  • • Color coding
  • • Strain relief options

Double-Ended Harnesses

XH connectors on both ends in same or different position counts.

  • • XH-XH connections
  • • Mixed position counts
  • • Custom lengths
  • • Shielding available

Multi-Branch Harnesses

One XH connector splitting to multiple XH connectors or wire ends.

  • • Power distribution
  • • Signal routing
  • • Custom breakouts
  • • Labeling options

Shielded Assemblies

XH connectors with shielded cable for EMI-sensitive applications.

  • • Foil shielding
  • • Braid shielding
  • • Foil + braid
  • • Drain wire

XH vs PH Series Comparison

Feature PH Series XH Series
Pitch 2.0mm 2.5mm
Current Rating 2A 3A
Voltage Rating 100V 250V
Locking Friction Lock Positive Lock
Primary Use Compact, Consumer Industrial, Power
